extendedInfo.description: Attack Velocity has taken the classic arcade action of decades gone by and made it a modern gaming masterpiece. Challenging and addictive, Attack Velocity is fun for new recruits and seasoned arcade captains alike. Shoot invaders from space with your ship. Can you beat the invasion?- Beautiful high quality graphics- Ship upgrades- Powerful weapons- Expert design- Google Play Leaderboard- Full game- Classic arcade action - Simple intuitive controls- ChallengingâThis is off the space-hook. This scrolling space shooter game adds the hyper to hyper drive. Fast paced classic gaming action, great graphics and user-friendly game play all add up to a Squid Weasel favourite.âSquid Weasel Arcade Review: 8 out of 10 tentacles flailing.Attack Velocity has beautiful fast moving graphics.  There is a demo version available that you can try first, before buying the full game to check your phone or tablet can handle it.If you have problems running Attack Velocity from your device, please email issues@fivestargames.co with details of the problem and your device make and model.  We will respond to your email within 24 hours.

reviews.title: Blast-tastic
reviews.comment: Wow great shoot em up. Ticks all the right boxes!  Great fun.
reviews.author: Ross Bailey

reviews.title: It\'s you against the rest of the universe
reviews.comment: Great fun shooting all the alien ships.  You got to be fast though!
reviews.author: James Stallwood
